entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
